infos.value: Lord Mont. Good work subduing those monsters.
By the way, Lord Mont. Are you aware of an item known as an EXP Cube?
Please wait a moment, Lord Mont. Those eyes...there is no mistaking it.
Lord Mont. You can now craft new equipment items, as well as enhance and awaken them.
By the way, Lord Mont. Do you know about the Farplane?
Lord Mont. You still possess the Cactuar Vision Card you obtained earlier, correct?
Shall we collect some esper training items by departing on a Chocobo Expedition?
That reminds me. Have you been making use of Auto Formation, Lord Mont?
Lord Mont. You can now take on the challenge of Multi Quests!
Lord Mont. You can now visit the Arena.
Lord Mont. You can now participate in Match Battles.
Lord Mont. You can now create and join guilds in the Farplane.
Welcome to the Guild Lobby. I shall give a simple explanation of what you can do here.
These are the Barracks, Lord Mont.
This is the Hall of Statues. Here you can view Guild Statues.
Lord Mont. Are you communicating with the other party members?
Lord Mont. It appears that some people are requesting our assistance.
Lord Mont, last time you made use of Limit Breaking to acquire the new Sub Job of Paladin.
Lord Mont. You can now take on the challenge of Hard Quests.
You have acquired an esper.
Lord Mont. You have grown so much since I first met you.
At last, you are off to attempt your first Guild Battle.
You are now able to set companions.
Lord Mont. It appears that an Exchange Shop has been established. Shall we have a look?
